titleStmt.title: A proclamation by his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax: concerning the proceedings of some ministers of the Church of England. The copy of a petition to the Kings Majestie with a representation of the desires of divers clergy-men. And His Excellencies resolution concerning the insolencies exercised by some, to abuse his Excellency and his Councell of Warre.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
